item.title: MAA Online Book Reviews
item.desc: Indexed by author, title, topic and reviewer.

item.title: Non-Newtonian Calculus by Michael Grossman and Robert Katz
item.desc: Includes discussions of general theory and heuristic guides for application.

item.title: 8paceart
item.desc: Abstract digital prints include UFO's, time travel, and "off-world" vistas along with less esoteric subjects.

item.title: Artsnova
item.desc: The digital art of Jim Plaxco. Galleries include abstract, astronomical, nature, and portrait.

item.title: Hamby, Genece
item.desc: Artist specializing in digital paintings, illustrations and art as everyday products.

item.title: Manders, John
item.desc: Illustrator of children's book offers prints of digital art. Includes artist's biography and information on school visits.

item.title: Personal Creative Services
item.desc: Creates collages and portraits from personal photographs.

item.desc: Digital art community featuring the works of member Poser/3D artists.

item.title: Zunuzin, Vladimir
item.desc: Digital graphics, oil and acrylic paintings, and digital photos are offered.
